definition: Lake Michigan, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: The Chicago waterways also have other access points to Lake Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥水道还有其他密歇根湖的进入点。

sentences.english: No Asian carp have yet been found in Lake Michigan.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖还尚未发现亚洲鲤鱼的踪迹。

sentences.english: Chicago sits next to Lake Michigan, one of North America's Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 芝加哥坐落在北美五大湖之一密歇根湖畔。

sentences.english: Lake Michigan shimmers in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖在阳光下波光粼粼。

sentences.english: After eating, I hiked to Lake Michigan, and sat up on a large sand dune .
sentences.chinese: 进食后，我徒步到密歇根湖和坐起来，在一个大沙丘。

definition: Lake Ontario, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Lake Erie, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Great Lakes/the five north American Great Lakes
Lake Huron, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Lake Superior, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Delaware River, between Pennsylvania and Delaware state, USA
